title: Ruby may…. do it too, right?
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Maki-chan, thanks for coming with Ruby to do shopping today<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I was thinking of going myself, so it’s fine<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Fufufu~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Umm, Maki-chan, can Ruby pick some clothes that suit you today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh…. Focus on your own shopping first. You came all the way to tokyo after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeeh-! But, but, Hanayo-chan and Rin-chan and Honoka-san were allowed to mess with your hair and make it cute, right, Maki-chan? So Ruby wants to try dressing Maki-chan up to be cute too…. Can Ruby?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….Who told you that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hanayo-chan and Rin-chan and Honoka-san! So umm.… may Ruby…. do it too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Why is everyone talking about it…. Fine, I guess it can’t be helped. I’ll go pick some clothes that suit you as well, Ruby. That way we’re even<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
